name: investment-projects-pan
title: Investment projects
description: Public investment projects, understood as the use of taxes by the government, to invest with the objective of benefiting the population through infrastructure works, services, development of productive projects, incentives in the creation and development of companies, promotion of commercial activities, generation of employment, protection of fundamental rights (health, education, social protection, etc.), and improvement of the quality of life.

contributors.title: Ministry of Economy and Finance of Panama (MEF)

sources.title: Ministry of Economy and Finance of Panama

resources.name: investment-projects
resources.title: Investment projects
resources.description: Public investment projects, understood as the use of taxes by the government, to invest with the objective of benefiting the population through infrastructure works, services, development of productive projects, incentives in the creation and development of companies, promotion of commercial activities, generation of employment, protection of fundamental rights (health, education, social protection, etc.), and improvement of the quality of life.

fields.name: IdProyecto
fields.description: Unique project identifier.

fields.name: NombreProyecto
fields.description: Full name of the project.

fields.name: FechaInicioProyecto
fields.description: Date the project started.

fields.name: FechaFinProyecto
fields.description: Expected project completion date.

fields.name: valorinicialestimado
fields.description: Estimated initial value of the project.

fields.name: presupuestovigente2023
fields.description: Total project value budgeted in 2023.

fields.name: ObjetivoGeneral
fields.description: General objective of the project.

fields.name: IdSector
fields.description: Identifier of the sector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: FechaUltimaModificacion
fields.description: Date of the last modification of the project.

fields.name: PorcentajeAvanceFinanciero
fields.description: Percentage of financial progress of the project.

fields.name: IDMoneda
fields.description: Identifier of the currency used in the project.

fields.name: Moneda
fields.description: Name of the currency used in the project.

fields.name: IdSubSector
fields.description: Identifier of the subsector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: nombresubsector
fields.description: Description of the subsector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: nombresector
fields.description: Subsector identifier in one digit.

fields.name: idejecutor
fields.description: Name of the sector to which the project belongs.

fields.name: nombreejecutor
fields.description: Identifier of the project executor.

fields.name: idareaejecutor
fields.description: Identifier of the area of ​​the project executor.

fields.name: nombreareaejecutor
fields.description: Name of the project executor area.

fields.name: codigoetapa
fields.description: Code of the stage the project is in.

fields.name: nombreetapa
fields.description: Name of the stage the project is in.

fields.name: codigofase
fields.description: Code of the phase the project is in.

fields.name: nombrefase
fields.description: Name of the phase the project is in.

fields.name: programa
fields.description: Identifier of the program to which the project belongs.

fields.name: descripcion_programas
fields.description: Name of the program to which the project belongs.

fields.name: subprograma
fields.description: Identifier of the subprogram to which the project belongs.

fields.name: descripcion_subprogramas
fields.description: Name of the applet to which the project belongs.

fields.name: actividad
fields.description: Identifier of the activity related to the project.

fields.name: descripcion_actividad
fields.description: Name of the activity related to the project.

fields.name: cod_reg
fields.description: Concatenated code of territorial registration of the project.

fields.name: provincia
fields.description: Identifier of the province where the project is executed.

fields.name: distritos
fields.description: Identifier of the district where the project is executed.

fields.name: corregimientos
fields.description: Identifier of the township where the project is executed.

fields.name: descripcion_provincia
fields.description: Name of the province where the project is being executed.

fields.name: descripcion_distritos
fields.description: Name of the district where the project is being executed.

fields.name: descripcion_corregimiento
fields.description: Name of the township where the project is being executed.
